root.title: trump make bid for control OF resort rtb
root.body: casino owner real estat develop donald trump offer acquir class B common share resort intern inc spokesman trump say the estat late resort chairman jame M crosbi own 340,783 752,297 class B share resort also 6,432,000 class A common share outstand each class B share 100 time vote power class A share give class B stock 93 pct resort vote power
